body:
Actually the current error message when you pass a non-trivial type is pretty decent: 
```
/home/psag/pytorch/pytorch/aten/src/ATen/Error.h:19:65: error: cannot pass objects of non-trivially-copyable type ‘class std::basic_string<char>’ through ‘...’
   snprintf(buffer, sizeof(buffer), format_string, format_args...);
```
